comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Joe Tinker's wife was Mary Tinker; they were in the news together because Joe took a leave from playing to provide blood for a transfusion into seriously ill Mary, in July 1913. (She later died by suicide, when she shot herself in 1923, aged 41. Joe's mother had also died by suicide, in 1904.) www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,717388,00.html
